title: Mage's Madness: A Half Moon Prophecy Novella
description: When no word or travellers come from the small village of Pellton, Count Meris sends a group of soldiers to investigate.  Paroled thief Riel, outcast due to his heritage, is amongst the group as they uncover the darkest of magic, defiling the dead and living alike.  Follow Riel as he uncovers the horrific fate of Pellton, and the threat hanging over the only home he knows.  Mage's Madness is the first book in The Half Moon Prophecy sequence, an exciting new fantasy adventure.
author: Matt Howley
